title: This Person Does Not Exist
description: An AI that generates incredibly realistic faces of people who don't actually exist using StyleGAN. Each refresh creates a completely new person.

title: AI Dungeon
description: An infinitely generated text adventure game powered by AI. Create any story, go anywhere, do anything in this AI-powered storytelling experience.

title: Artbreeder
description: Collaborative AI art tool that lets you create and explore images using GANs. Mix and breed images to create endless variations.

title: RunwayML
description: Creative AI tools for artists and creators. Generate videos, images, and audio with cutting-edge machine learning models.

title: Quick, Draw!
description: Google's AI experiment that challenges you to draw objects while a neural network tries to guess what you're drawing.

title: Talk to Transformer
description: GPT-2 powered text completion tool. Start typing and watch AI continue your thoughts in surprisingly coherent ways.

title: DeepFakes Web
description: Online deepfake maker that uses AI to swap faces in videos. Create realistic face swaps with just a few clicks.

title: Magenta Studio
description: Google's AI music tools that help you create music using machine learning. Generate melodies, drums, and more.

title: This Cat Does Not Exist
description: Like This Person Does Not Exist, but for cats! AI-generated feline faces that look surprisingly real.

title: Remove.bg
description: AI-powered background removal tool. Upload any image and get a perfect cutout in seconds.

title: Akinator
description: The web genie that reads your mind! Think of a character and Akinator will guess who it is through AI-powered questions.

title: DeepL Translator
description: AI-powered translation that's often more accurate than Google Translate. Uses neural networks for natural translations.

title: Runway Green Screen
description: AI-powered green screen removal without the green screen. Remove backgrounds from videos automatically.

title: AI Weirdness
description: A blog showcasing the hilarious and bizarre results when AI tries to understand human things. Neural networks being weird.

title: Teachable Machine
description: Google's tool for training your own machine learning models. No coding required - just upload examples and train!

title: DALL-E Mini
description: Create images from text descriptions using AI. Type anything and watch the AI attempt to draw it.

title: Infinite Craft
description: A crafting game where you combine elements to create new things. Start with fire, water, earth, and wind.

title: Pockemon
description: AI-generated Pokemon with descriptions. See what happens when neural networks try to create new Pokemon.

title: Semantic Scholar
description: AI-powered academic search engine that understands scientific literature and finds relevant papers.

title: Lobe
description: Microsoft's visual tool for training machine learning models. Drag, drop, and train without writing code.

title: Waifu2x
description: AI-powered image upscaling specifically designed for anime and artwork. Make images bigger without losing quality.

title: Jukebox
description: OpenAI's neural network that generates music in raw audio format. Create songs in various genres and styles.

title: This Word Does Not Exist
description: AI that generates fake words that sound like they could be real. Complete with definitions and pronunciations.

title: AI Painter
description: Transform your photos into artwork using AI. Apply various artistic styles from famous painters.

title: Dream Interpreter AI
description: Type your dream and let the AI give you a surreal and poetic interpretation. It blends psychology, symbolism, and a bit of absurdity.

title: RoboPoet
description: Generate poems in various styles and moods using AI. Romantic sonnet or post-apocalyptic haiku? Your robot muse awaits.

title: This Resume Does Not Exist
description: A surreal AI experiment generating fake resumes with uncanny names, job titles, and skills.

title: Latent Space Explorer
description: Visually navigate the 'latent space' of GANs to discover strange and beautiful in-between images.

title: AI Roguelite
description: An AI-generated dungeon crawler where the levels, monsters, and items are created on the fly as you play.

title: This Startup Does Not Exist
description: Discover hilarious and oddly plausible fake startups with generated names, taglines, and business models.

title: Deep Nostalgia
description: Bring old photos to life. AI animates faces in historical pictures to create realistic blinking and smiling.

title: AI Comic Factory
description: Write your own comic script and have AI generate a comic strip based on it — characters, dialogue, and panels included.

title: SongR
description: Describe a mood or story and let AI generate song lyrics for you — complete with rhymes and chorus.

title: Chirp AI
description: Enter a topic and this AI writes eerily accurate fake tweets in the style of famous personalities.
